name: CyberCode Online
summary:
CyberCode Online is a browser & mobile based MMORPG game that is disguised as VS Code in the browser where you click functions and variables in the ever changing source code to navigate your character in a Cyber Punk inspired world.
It is meant to be played casually with AFK tasks, leveling and Crafting. Includes a huge array of randomly generated enemies, dungeons and locations pulled from a user contributed list. The game provides a platform for everyone to chitchat and slack!
